p: By combining the volatile profiles and ISSR molecular markers using bioinformatic tools, we were successful in clustering the Vitex species in order to identify markers for chemosystematic classification. In this work, V. gardneriana was isolated from the other species, expanding our understanding of the chemodiversity of this genus. In addition, the volatile components extracted from V. gardneriana showed potential for controlling A. guerreronis, as it was highly toxic to this coconut pest.
